debugging-question2_key1: Yeh rock paper scissors game ka program hai. Iss game ko aap computer ke against kheloge. Iss game ke 3 rules hai
debugging-question2_key2: Rock Paper se haar jata hai
debugging-question2_key3: Paper Scissors se haar jaata hai
debugging-question2_key5: Appko pehle rock,paper ya scissors mei se chose karna hoga. Aur uske baad computer randomly inme se ek option chose karega. Firr, upar diye gaye rules ke hisab se result aayega. Jaise:
debugging-question2_key6: Agar aapne "Rock" chose kiya aur computer ne "Scissors"
debugging-question2_key7: To aap jeet jaoge kyunki "Rock" "Scissors" ko hara deta hai. ( Rule 3 )
debugging-question2_key8: Aap iss game ke rules iss
